verbs.description: You could almost hear the strains of " Give Me that Old Time Religion " in the background as the Morning Joe crew used religion to blast Trump on Thursday . In addition to Holy Joe Scarborough leading the charge was guest Eddie Glaude who recently went on an anti - Israel tirade as well as sanctimonious Jon Meacham who declared that anyone who supports Trump is committing idolatry .
